mobile.subtitle: Everything you need in one place

WhyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
WhyChooseUs.p1: we are a Puerto Rican company established in 2020 as a result of the COVID pandemic.
WhyChooseUs.p2: Our medical group is composed of a diverse number of assistant doctors, nurses, internists, and specialists. Our goal is to bring Health to the greatest number of people in Puerto Rico from our center to the comfort of your home.

HowItWorks.title: How it works?
HowItWorks.subtitle: Follow these steps to get the desired prescription
HowItWorks.step1: Complete the registration, choose the desired medical or laboratory service.
HowItWorks.step2: Pay with Credit Card or ATH MOVIL.
HowItWorks.step3: If it is a chosen laboratory, it arrives immediately at your email.
HowItWorks.step4: If it is a medical appointment, a doctor will contact you during the day. If you need a faster appointment, please call us at our number (787) 710-7426.

t1.text: Excellent service, the prescription reached my email in less than 10 minutes. Highly recommended.
t1.author: Maria Rodriguez

t2.text: The Dr.'s attention was exceptional. I was able to handle my medication refill without leaving home.
t2.author: Carlos Ortiz

t3.text: Very easy to use. The payment process with ATH MÃ³vil was super fast. Thanks!
t3.author: Elena Rivera

para-ella.longDescription: Prevention, diagnosis, and medical support with professional and safe care.

certificado-mdico-26.title: Medical Certificate
certificado-mdico-26.description: We offer a medical service oriented to provide you with a full clinical evaluation and the necessary certification to justify your work absence.

examen-licencia-conducir-27.title: Driver's License Exam
examen-licencia-conducir-27.description: Medical evaluation for driver's license application or renewal.

programa-de-salud-sexual-para-hombres-37.title: Men's Sexual Health Program
programa-de-salud-sexual-para-hombres-37.description: Medical consultation for erectile dysfunction, focused on diagnosing the cause and offering safe and confidential treatment.

back-to-school-39.title: Back to School
back-to-school-39.description: Professional pediatric consultation to obtain the medical certificate necessary for returning to classes.

cita-de-seguimiento-31.title: Follow-up Appointment
cita-de-seguimiento-31.description: Follow-up medical consultation for existing patients.

cita-medica-nuevo-paciente-30.title: New Patient Medical Appointment
cita-medica-nuevo-paciente-30.description: Comprehensive medical evaluation for new patients.

consulta-por-covid-positivo-33.title: COVID Positive Consultation
consulta-por-covid-positivo-33.description: Personalized medical consultation from home to evaluate your symptoms and guide you through treatment.

evaluacin-mdica-del-sueo-36.title: Medical Sleep Evaluation
evaluacin-mdica-del-sueo-36.description: Professional evaluation to diagnose and treat your sleep problems. Includes habit review and personalized diagnosis.

evaluacin-mdica-inmediata-38.title: Immediate Medical Evaluation
evaluacin-mdica-inmediata-38.description: Quick and professional consultation to obtain diagnosis, prescriptions or certificates the same day.

receta-de-medicamentos-o-refill-25.title: Medication Prescription or Refill
receta-de-medicamentos-o-refill-25.description: Get your medication refills or new prescriptions quickly.

anlisis-de-orina-y-cultivo-de-orina-10.title: Urinalysis and Urine Culture
anlisis-de-orina-y-cultivo-de-orina-10.description: Urinalysis checks the appearance and content of your urine. Urine culture looks for bacteria causing infections.

cbc-diff-lab-45.title: CBC + DIFF Lab
cbc-diff-lab-45.description: Measures different types of cells in the blood (red blood cells, white blood cells, platelets) to detect infections or anemia.

femenino-prueba-de-sangre-blood-test-cbc.title: Female Blood Test Panel
femenino-prueba-de-sangre-blood-test-cbc.description: Comprehensive set of blood and urine tests to evaluate general health (CBC, CMP, Lipid Panel, Thyroid, etc).

mamografia-29.title: Mammography
mamografia-29.description: Specialized X-ray of the breasts that allows early detection of abnormalities like tumors or microcalcifications.

masculino-prueba-de-sangre-blood-test-cb.title: Male Blood Test Panel
masculino-prueba-de-sangre-blood-test-cb.description: Comprehensive set of blood and urine tests to evaluate general health (CBC, CMP, Lipid Panel, Thyroid, etc).

prueba-de-covid-19-ant-geno-2.title: COVID-19 Antigen Test
prueba-de-covid-19-ant-geno-2.description: Detects parts of the virus in people with an active infection. Results in 15-30 minutes.

prueba-de-covid-19-molecular-pcr-3.title: COVID-19 Molecular PCR Test
prueba-de-covid-19-molecular-pcr-3.description: Precise test to detect if you are infected with the virus. Confirms diagnosis even with few symptoms.

prueba-de-covid-19-serolgica-rapid-test-.title: COVID-19 Serological Rapid Test
prueba-de-covid-19-serolgica-rapid-test-.description: Detects antibodies in the blood indicating past exposure to the virus. Results in minutes.

prueba-de-embarazo-15.title: Pregnancy Test
prueba-de-embarazo-15.description: Detects the hCG hormone to confirm pregnancy. Can be done with urine or blood sample.

prueba-de-influenza-a-y-b-14.title: Influenza A & B Test
prueba-de-influenza-a-y-b-14.description: Detects if a person has the flu virus type A or B. Useful for quick treatment decisions.

prueba-de-micoplasma-o-bronchitis-12.title: Mycoplasma or Bronchitis Test
prueba-de-micoplasma-o-bronchitis-12.description: Blood test to detect Mycoplasma or Bronchitis.

prueba-de-sangre-pth-13.title: PTH Blood Test
prueba-de-sangre-pth-13.description: Measures parathyroid hormone in the blood, which regulates calcium and phosphorus levels.

prueba-de-sedimento-esr-11.title: Sedimentation Rate (ESR) Test
prueba-de-sedimento-esr-11.description: Measures how fast red blood cells settle. High value may indicate inflammation.

prueba-diabetes-hba1c-41.title: Diabetes Test (HbA1c%)
prueba-diabetes-hba1c-41.description: Measures average blood sugar of the last 2-3 months. Key for diagnosing diabetes.

quantitative-hcg-test-35.title: Quantitative hCG Test
quantitative-hcg-test-35.description: Measures the exact amount of pregnancy hormone (hCG) in the blood. More precise than urine test.

sonomamografia-28.title: Sono-mammography
sonomamografia-28.description: Ultrasound of the breast, complements mammography. Ideal for dense breasts.

strep-throat-garganta-44.title: Strep Throat Test
strep-throat-garganta-44.description: Rapid test detects Streptococcus bacteria in the throat in minutes.

panel-respiratorio-covid-19-molecular-in.title: Respiratory Panel
panel-respiratorio-covid-19-molecular-in.description: Combined test for COVID-19, Influenza A/B and Mycoplasma. Identifies cause of respiratory symptoms.

pruebas-para-licencia-matrimonial-32.title: Marriage License Tests
pruebas-para-licencia-matrimonial-32.description: Fulfill health requirements for marriage. Includes blood tests, STD tests, and medical certificate.

test-de-enfermedades-de-transmisin-sexua.title: STD Panel
test-de-enfermedades-de-transmisin-sexua.description: Detects infections like HIV, syphilis, chlamydia, gonorrhea. Important for sexually active people.

programa-de-reduccin-de-peso-58.title: Weight Reduction Program
programa-de-reduccin-de-peso-58.description: Includes appointment, lab tests, and prescription.
